title: The Endless Sky
description: Phillipe de Vallombrosa was lured to the Dakota Badlands by the same dream that seduced his infamous father -- a drive to succeed over the forces of nature in a feral land. He vows to stand defiant against the ruthless enemies determined to destroy him, even as ambition leads him into the treacherous territory of seduction, betrayal, and love.
author: Kathryn Lynn Davis
